summary: Small but hard, pitch black tomb near riverwood across the river. GERMAN and ENGLISH
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=http://www.ld-host.de/][/url][/center][center][url=http://www.ld-host.de/][/url][/center][center][url=http://www.ld-host.de/]
[img]http://www.ld-host.de/uploads/images/c6c3a9c5d605d6061c3665268d6cc086.gif[/img][/url] 
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65157/?][b][i][font=Georgia][size=3]Download the "Free-to-play-seal
[/size][/font][/i][/b][/url]
[b][i][u][font=Georgia][size=5][/size][/font][/u][/i][/b][b][i][u][font=Georgia][size=5]Changelog
[/size][/font][/u][/i][/b][spoiler]
Update 1.03                    This update  makes  the  crown  in  the  dungeon  unaccessable, 
                                        if  the  barriers   aren 't  lowered. The  load-door,  which  is not 
                                             accessable but was visual on the map has been disabled                  

Update 1.04                     This  update corrects the jagged  crown by leaving it  untouched
                                           Some   unaccessable  parts of  the  dungeon  have  been  erased 
 and  won 't cause  confusion anymore. 

Update 1.05                     The  patched  version  removes a problem  in  bleakfalls barrow,
       caused by the previous version of this mod.

Update 1.06                     Fixes the "Crown of Magnus", now it looks on the Charakter, like
it looks in the inventory.                       

[/spoiler]
[img]http://116.imagebam.com/download/KQW_rjDQYJiJ2Ran7EU3Iw/51572/515710531/description.gif[/img]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]This mod adds a Tomb on the other side of the river near riverwood. It 's a [/size]
[size=3]small  but hard  Tomb, which hides some secrets  to discover for you. Nice [/size]
[size=3]magical  items  to  claim  and  riches to  finde! Make  sure you  got a  tank-
follower  [/size][size=3]with you and as many healing-potions you can get! This dungeon
btw. is pitch [/size][size=3]black, so you should also have much torches in your inventory! 
Have fun guys, [/size][size=3]embrace the challange!

If  you are afraid of the  dark and you think  the vanilla torches  aren 't good
enought, you may try these: [/size][/font][b][i][u][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9605/?]Double Torch Radius[/url] [/u][/i][/b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=3]
If you don 't want to kill the immersion, you should use the 2xRanged Version![/size]

[b][i][u][color=#ff0000][size=5][/size][/color][/u][/i][/b][/font][b][i][u][color=#ff0000][size=5]SPOILER-ALERT  // BUT FIRST TRY YOURSELF // 
[url=https://youtu.be/-62JNJqQiu0]!!!!THIS VIDEO IS GOING TO SPOILER ALL SECRETS!!!![/url]
CHECK IF YOU MISSED SOMETHING [/size][/color][/u][/i][/b]

If Problems emerge i try to solve them ASAP

Don 't do anything to this mod-content without asking! You have
to wait  for my answer and  permission!  Don 't reupload  without
permission!  If  permission  is  granted, full credit has to be given![/size][/font]
